Class DefaultTaskExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.scheduling.DefaultTaskExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanExceptionHandler<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Throwable>, TaskExceptionHandler<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Throwable>, java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Throwable>

    @Singleton
 @Primary
public class DefaultTaskExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskExceptionHandler<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Throwable>
    The default exception handler used if non other is found. Simply logs the exception.

    1.0
